DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine dermal sensitization potential azelaic acid pre-foam formulation .
DOC.brief_title: Human Repeated Insult Patch Test ( HRIPT ) Azelaic Acid Pre Foam Formulation
DOC.detailed_description: In induction phase three time weekly exposure three week perform , follow rest phase . In follow challenge phase single exposure perform potential skin reaction observe . If skin reaction occur optional re-challenge phase may perform .
DOC.criteria: healthy volunteer male female subject age 18 65 year ability understand fulfill study requirement affect skin designate test area pregnancy lactation willing comply study requirement
